The claim was made by a Twitter user: impressionsAS, who stated that all BJP MLAs of Punjab have joined the Congress. This claim was not reported by the media.
The claim was also made in Hindi on Twit: who posted it on an Akhilesh Yadav fan page on Facebook. The post gained significant reactions and was shared by a popular Facebook page.
The authenticity of the claim was verifi: which confirmed that there are currently two BJP MLAs in the state.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, spoke with the two BJP MLAs in Punjab, Arun Narang and Dinesh Singh, who categorically refuted the claims and stated that they are not leaving the BJP.
